remarks: Lemma to connect transfinite recursion theorems with finite recursion. That is, given the conditions ` F Fn _V ` and ` A e. V ` on ` frec ( F , A ) ` , we want to be able to apply ~ tfri1d or ~ tfri2d , and this lemma lets us satisfy hypotheses of those theorems. (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 15-Aug-2019.)
statement:
frectfr.1 $e |- G = ( g e. _V |-> { x | ( E. m e. _om ( dom g = suc m /\ x e. ( F ` ( g ` m ) ) ) \/ ( dom g = (/) /\ x e. A ) ) } ) $.
frectfr $p |- ( ( F Fn _V /\ A e. V ) -> A. y ( Fun G /\ ( G ` y ) e. _V ) ) $.
$d A g m x y $.
$d F g m x y $.
$d V g m y $.
